text:
Hey <@UA7JFQSQ0> thanks for this it is working now in Themes DND, however I've noticed it is not working in old template drag and drop. see this video Thanks
<https://share.vidyard.com/watch/2KZ8amkwU5yVepuk6Eg4xx>?
Is that header module inside of a DnD area? The h1-h4 options will only show for modules that are in DnD areas.

Hi <@UA7JFQSQ0> the video above display 2 examples
1. Using *new* Theme DND template - which is already working properly.
2. Using Old Template drag and drop 2016-2019 (Not a theme) which is *not* working in page editor
• <https://prnt.sc/uzj7c0>
• <https://prnt.sc/uzj7yj>
Hope it is make sense.. please see the video above thanks

Hello,
I have create a module to display on page with listing of product and one page to display the detail of one product. I query an external API. The problem is the SEO. Google index not correctly the content of page because all is render with javascript.
It’s possible to make a curl query to render HTML on server site ?
Thank you
